menu.run: The Waiter is running to you!

about.about: With exquisite cuisine made from the bounty of the sea and panoramic views of endless blue waters, Ara...zo promises an unforgettable oceanfront dining experience.

header.call: For calling waiter click the button

alert.oops: oooops. Something got wrong. Your message wasn't sent. Please, try again.
alert.run: Waiter is already running to you.
alert.inside: You need to be inside the restaurant to call the waiter.
alert.else: Do you want to order something more instead of Bill?
alert.enableLoc: Please enable location services to be able to call waiter.Our app need to check if you are inside the restaurant, otherwise you won't be able to call the waiter.
